alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 8:17PM CST until February 07 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sunflower River At Sunflower. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Field west of river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 10.6 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Sunflower River Sunflower 21.0 21.5 Mon 7 pm CST 20.1 18.4 16.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 900 AM CST.
